Reference

Main module

This is the main function to run a full IDEA4 diagnosis

diag_idea()

Run a complete IDEA4 diagnosis

Core modules

Functions used under the hood by diag_idea

read_idea()

Read IDEA4 items and metadata

compute_idea()

Compute IDEA4 indicators and aggregation metrics

old_idea()

Read "old" IDEA data files

plot_idea()

Plot IDEA4 results

write_idea()

Write IDEA4 results and graphs to local disc

Utility functions

Other miscellaneous functions

theme_idea()

IDEA ggplot2 theme

show_canvas()

Show the blank tree canvas

show_decision_rules()

Show decision rules
